Read Data

```{r}
candy = read.csv("candy-data.csv")
summary(candy)
```

```{r}
candy.lm = lm(winpercent ~ . - competitorname, data=candy)
summary(candy.lm)
plot(candy.lm)
```


```{r}
library(BAS)
candy.bas = bas.lm(winpercent ~ (. - competitorname)^2, data=candy,
                   prior = 'JZS', modelprior=uniform())
image(candy.bas)
```
